Document.Focus: After vaginal delivery - in the hospital

QAPair.Question: What is (are) After vaginal delivery - in the hospital ?
QAPair.Answer: Most women will remain in the hospital for about 24 hours after delivery. This is an important time for you to rest, bond with your new baby, and get help with breastfeeding and newborn care.

QAPair.Question: What is the outlook for After vaginal delivery - in the hospital ?
